title: Google Pixel 1 don´t turn and just shows the red light flashing on top of screen.
content: The smartphone stays unresponsive (no buttons command turn on the smartphone ) and just shows a red light flashing on top of screen. I have been open my smartphone to check if there are some cable disconected but everything is right connected. My doubt it is about: this is a battery problem ? I have to replace it ? The phone turn on normally without the battery or not, if i could test if it´s turning on ?
